multi-media-encyclopedia.title: Building a free open-source multi-media encyclopedia
multi-media-encyclopedia.intro: Wikipedia, the world's 6th most visited website, is one of the greatest example of the open source movement. At VideoWiki, we are a group of people who want to evolve Wikipedia from a text-based encyclopedia to a multi-media encyclopedia.
multi-media-encyclopedia.addition:
* Language: English
* Audience: Node.js developers who are interested in building Video version of Wikipedia
* Difficulty: Begineer / 入門

Pratik Shetty.speaker: Pratik Shetty
Pratik Shetty.name: Pratik Shetty
Pratik Shetty.intro: 3x Social Entrepreneur (TLRF, Keep India Clean, VideoWiki)

ossoftware.title: Open Source Software Development & Management
ossoftware.intro: 開發 FOSS 專案所需具備的知識和技能，包含工具、流程、專案管理和產品交付
